approve.description: Allows a spender to withdraw from the caller’s account up to the amount specified.

transfer.description: Transfers tokens directly from the caller’s address to another address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another on behalf of the sender.

constructor.description: Initializes the contract with specified addresses.

DELEGATION_TYPEHASH.description: Returns the type hash for delegation.

allowance.description: Returns the remaining number of tokens that a spender is allowed to spend from the owner's account.

burn.description: Burns a specified amount of tokens.

checkpoints.description: Returns the checkpoint information for a delegate.

claimGovernance.description: Claims governance rights for the new governance address.

configChangesInitiated.description: Returns the timestamp when configuration changes were initiated.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimals used by the token.

decreaseAllowance.description: Decreases the allowance for a spender.

delegate.description: Delegates voting power to another address.

delegateBySig.description: Delegates voting power to another address via signature.

delegates.description: Returns the delegate address for a given account.

emissionRateMultiplierNumerator.description: Returns the emission rate multiplier numerator.

getCurrentVotes.description: Returns the current voting power of an account.

getPriorVotes.description: Returns the prior voting power of an account at a specific block number.

increaseAllowance.description: Increases the allowance for a spender.

initiateConfigChanges.description: Initiates changes to the configuration parameters.

isBurningAllowed.description: Checks if burning tokens is allowed.

isPendleToken.description: Checks if the token is a Pendle token.

lastWeekEmissionSent.description: Returns the amount of emission sent in the last week.

lastWeeklyEmission.description: Returns the amount of weekly emission.

liquidityIncentivesRecipient.description: Returns the address of the liquidity incentives recipient.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

nonces.description: Returns the nonce for a given address.

numCheckpoints.description: Returns the number of checkpoints for a given address.

pendingEmissionRateMultiplierNumerator.description: Returns the pending emission rate multiplier numerator.

pendingIsBurningAllowed.description: Returns the pending status of burning allowance.

pendingLiquidityIncentivesRecipient.description: Returns the pending liquidity incentives recipient address.

pendingTerminalInflationRateNumerator.description: Returns the pending terminal inflation rate numerator.

startTime.description: Returns the start time of the contract.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

terminalInflationRateNumerator.description: Returns the terminal inflation rate numerator.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

transferGovernance.description: Transfers governance rights to a new address.

withdrawToken.description: Withdraws ERC20 tokens from the contract.
